abstract: Latest reading habit trends noted, including growth in preference for paper over e-books, demand for adult coloring titles, uptick in audiobook sales and increase in book downloads to smartphones.

headline.main: We’re Buying Paperbacks, Audiobooks and Coloring Books — but Not E-Books

snippet: After years of growth, digital book sales fell nearly 10 percent last year, while paperback sales grew 16 percent, a survey shows.
lead_paragraph: After years of growth, digital book sales fell nearly 10 percent last year, while paperback sales grew 16 percent, a survey shows.
